segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and I can’t help but feel a little worried about the mess it’s making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks like it’s going to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting so patiently, but I’m afraid the boy might fall before she gets her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, and I wonder if she’ll notice the water before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so slippery, and someone could really get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to lose his balance any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, but I’m just worried about the boy falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and I can’t believe no one is stopping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the water soon before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
